basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period July-September
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color golden yellow

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, more resistant to shade, place in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
